item.description: Indexes in relational databases are a very imporatant feature, that reduce the cost of our lookup queries.

item.title: In and out of PostgreSQL using COPY
item.description: I am pretty sure everyone of us has been in a situation where you needed to generate a report and/or extract some data from a database and present it in a spreadsheet.
